org.ow2.proactive.resourcemanager.authentication

Class RMAuthenticationImpl

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ow2.proactive.authentication.AuthenticationImpl
      • org.ow2.proactive.resourcemanager.authentication.RMAuthenticationImpl
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Serializable, org.objectweb.proactive.Active, org.objectweb.proactive.InitActive, org.objectweb.proactive.RunActive, Authentication, Loggable, RMAuthentication

    public class RMAuthenticationImpl
extends AuthenticationImpl
implements RMAuthentication, org.objectweb.proactive.InitActive
    RMAuthenticationImpl represents authentication service of the resource manager.
    Since:
    ProActive Scheduling 1.0
